definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Some of the farmers had quit farming and were cutting railroad ties so they could feed their families.
sentences.chinese: 有些農民放棄了耕作，靠砍伐鋪鐵路的枕木養家餬口。

sentences.english: Changes in the existing farming system in rural areas than "Robbery and Snatching" end after the break.
sentences.chinese: 現時耕作制度改變，農村多於“雙搶”結束後才休息。

sentences.english: Fallow and recently harvested fields are lighter blue.
sentences.chinese: 未耕作土地及剛收割完畢的田地則呈現淡藍色。

sentences.english: Irrigated farming is the primary kind of agricultures in mess plateau.
sentences.chinese: 黃土高原自然條件特殊，耕作農業以引水灌溉爲主。

sentences.english: In Britain, for example, farming takes only 3% of all water withdrawals.
sentences.chinese: 比如在英國，耕作只佔總取水量的3%。
連續耕作使土壤變得貧瘠。

sentences.english: Impoverish the soil by overuse . See Synonyms at deplete.
sentences.chinese: 過度耕作而使土壤變得貧瘠參見。

sentences.english: The husbandmen that laboreth must be the first to partake of the fruits.
sentences.chinese: 辛勤耕作的農夫應該首先享受所收成的。

sentences.english: No-tillage has appropriate seeding depth and its uniformity also very good.
sentences.chinese: 免耕耕作具有均勻合適的播種深度。

sentences.english: Years ago an operator had to make the connection.
sentences.chinese: 多年前必須有接線生來做接通的耕作。

sentences.english: Her nephew, Jesse's father, worked in an adjoining field.
sentences.chinese: 她的侄子，傑希的父親，在相鄰的土地上耕作。

sentences.english: The use of horese for ploughing still prevails among the poorer farmers.
sentences.chinese: 用馬耕作的現象在貧苦農民中仍然十分盛行。

sentences.english: Safeguard the amount of land for grain growing, and carry out the reform to promote large-scale farming system.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格耕地保護，推進耕作制度改革和規模化種植。

sentences.english: Thus, it is suitable for HongKong to implement organic farming in small scale of area.
sentences.chinese: 在香港小區域範圍內實行有機耕作是可行的。

sentences.english: There was not much land to cultivate in the village.
sentences.chinese: 那村可耕作的土地沒有多少。

sentences.english: Traditional farming system with a plough has restricted the development of agriculture in our country.
sentences.chinese: 以鏵式犁爲主的傳統耕作制度制約着我國農業的發展。

definition: to clear a wild area for cultivation/to put under the plow
to lie idle (of arable land)/fig. rusty because of lack of practice
